entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one giving orders to Harry. She says 'It's McGonagall's orders' indicating that she is following instructions from McGonagall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is not hurt. He responds to Ginny's statement by saying 'I'm not hurt'.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as the one giving orders to everyone, including Ginny. Ginny says 'It's McGonagall's orders' indicating that she is following instructions from McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing. Ginny says 'Everyone's up there, Ron and Hermione and Lupin and everyone'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing. Ginny says 'Everyone's up there, Ron and Hermione and Lupin and everyone'.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing. Ginny says 'Everyone's up there, Ron and Hermione and Lupin and everyone'.

relationships.description: McGonagall gives orders to Ginny, who is following her instructions.
Ginny informs Harry about McGonagall's orders and the people who are up in the hospital wing.
Ginny mentions Ron as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing.
Ginny mentions Hermione as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing.
Ginny mentions Lupin as one of the people who are up in the hospital wing.
